name: Borderline Project: Beta-2
description:
Beta-2 is a psychological thriller where you, the player, take on the role of Alina, a young woman who undertakes a quest to find her missing partner: Romina. In order to find her, Alina must face numerous obstacles (in the shape of a wide variety of puzzles) where she'll uncover the many mysteries surrounding the series of murders that have taken place in her city, committed by the "Den Tabte Monster".

This game is part of the Borderline Project universe and it connects to many different stories you can find throughout a variety of platforms (facebook, twitter, youtube, etc).

If you want to know more about the Borderline Project, you can find us at www.facebook.com/proyectolimite
